participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for music and recording.
participant_1.background: i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Elena
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a love for literature and nature.
participant_2.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

content.text: Hey! Do you love to read?
